verses.name: 1 Timothy 2:1
verses.text: I exhort therefore, that, first of all, supplications, prayers, intercessions, and giving of thanks, be made for all men;

verses.name: 1 Timothy 2:2
verses.text: For kings, and for all that are in authority; that we may lead a quiet and peaceable life in all godliness and honesty.

verses.name: 1 Timothy 2:3
verses.text: For this is good and acceptable in the sight of God our Saviour;

verses.name: 1 Timothy 2:4
verses.text: Who will have all men to be saved, and to come unto the knowledge of the truth.

verses.name: 1 Timothy 2:5
verses.text: For there is one God, and one mediator between God and men, the man Christ Jesus;

verses.name: 1 Timothy 2:6
verses.text: Who gave himself a ransom for all, to be testified in due time.

verses.name: 1 Timothy 2:7
verses.text: Whereunto I am ordained a preacher, and an apostle, (I speak the truth in Christ, and lie not;) a teacher of the Gentiles in faith and verity.

verses.name: 1 Timothy 2:8
verses.text: I will therefore that men pray every where, lifting up holy hands, without wrath and doubting.

verses.name: 1 Timothy 2:9
verses.text: In like manner also, that women adorn themselves in modest apparel, with shamefacedness and sobriety; not with broided hair, or gold, or pearls, or costly array;

verses.name: 1 Timothy 2:10
verses.text: But (which becometh women professing godliness) with good works.

verses.name: 1 Timothy 2:11
verses.text: Let the woman learn in silence with all subjection.

verses.name: 1 Timothy 2:12
verses.text: But I suffer not a woman to teach, nor to usurp authority over the man, but to be in silence.

verses.name: 1 Timothy 2:13
verses.text: For Adam was first formed, then Eve.

verses.name: 1 Timothy 2:14
verses.text: And Adam was not deceived, but the woman being deceived was in the transgression.

verses.name: 1 Timothy 2:15
verses.text: Notwithstanding she shall be saved in childbearing, if they continue in faith and charity and holiness with sobriety.
